General.Name: Chengdu Xingrong Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Xingrong Environment Co., Ltd. engages in the water purification and environmental protection business in China. It purifies and provides tap water; and offers urban and rural domestic sewage, and industrial wastewater treatment services, as well as reclaimed water utilization services. The company also provides landfill leachate treatment, and sludge waste disposal services; food and kitchen waste disposal services; and operates waste incineration power generation plant. In addition, it offers engineering services, such as construction of municipal pipelines, design and construction of water environmental protection projects, technical consultation and development, and detection of water supply and drainage pipeline networks. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Xingrong Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chengdu Xingrong Environment Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Chengdu Xingrong Environment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Chengdu, China.
